attributes.action: Include Creation Science in the National Curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: Children should learn about Creation Science. Currently it is kept within religious communities, but schools should be able to explore it in the classroom so that children can look at the information and make their own conclusions.
attributes.background: There is a lot of literature and research on Creation Science. The Government should consider its inclusion in the national curriculum in respect to the study of origins alongside evolution which is already in the curriculum.
